headline: Snap-On Inc. (SNA)-A Bear Case Theory
summary: In this article, we’ll summarize a bearish thesis posted on VIC regarding Snap-On Inc. (SNA) in late July when SNA stock was trading at $280.66. Since the publication of this thesis, SNA stock has defied expectations, gaining approximately 27% and currently trading at $357.06. Despite the bear case outlined in the thesis, the stock has […]
